\f0\fs26 \cf0 Carillon is an open source OS X app, specifically for Hackintosh machines, that plays the classic "Chime" boot sound on startup that real Macs have.\ \ A new launch daemon will be added that triggers the sound, meaning, unlike most similar apps, this one runs much earlier during the boot process, even before the login screen appears.\ \ For more info, and the source code, take a look at the Carillon GitHub repo:\ \ {\field{\*\fldinst{HYPERLINK "https://github.com/nicoSWD/Carillon"}}{\fldrslt https://github.com/nicoSWD/Carillon}}}
